critical-execution-criteria.condition-expression: (A AND B) OR (C AND D AND E)

warning-execution-criteria.condition-expression: (A AND B) OR (C AND D AND E)

health-rule.name: JVM Heap utilization is too high
JVM Garbage Collection Time is too high

policy-condition.display-name: JVM|Garbage Collection|GC Time Spent Per Min (ms) Condition

metric-definition.logical-metric-name: JVM|Garbage Collection|GC Time Spent Per Min (ms)

policy-condition.display-name: JVM|Garbage Collection|GC Time Spent Per Min (ms) Condition

metric-definition.logical-metric-name: JVM|Garbage Collection|GC Time Spent Per Min (ms)

health-rule.name: CLR Garbage Collection Time is too high

policy-condition.condition-expression: ({Packets Dropped Per Sec} / {Packets Received Per Sec}) * 100
({Packets Dropped Per Sec} / {Packets Received Per Sec}) * 100

health-rule.name: Business Transaction response time is much higher than normal
health-rule.description: Average Response Time (ms) is > 2 : 3 standard deviation of the default baseline and Calls per Minute is > 50 per minute for the last 30 minutes

health-rule.name: Business Transaction error rate is much higher than normal
health-rule.description: Errors per Minute is > 2 : 3 standard deviation of the default baseline and Errors per Minute is > 10 per minute and Calls per Minute is > 50 per minute for the last 30 minutes

health-rule.name: CMS Garbage Collection Time is too high

metric-definition.logical-metric-name: JVM|Garbage Collection|Number of Major Collections Per Min
JVM|Garbage Collection|Number of Major Collections Per Min

health-rule.name: _ Node slow
health-rule.description: Errors per Minute is > 2 : 3 standard deviation of the default baseline and Errors per Minute is > 10 per minute and Calls per Minute is > 50 per minute for the last 30 minutes

health-rule.name: JVM permGen utilization is too high
